DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: there is a positive correlation between tissue thickness measured from CBCT and clinical measurements.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Soft and Hard Tissue Thickness in the Anterior Regions of the Upper and Lower Jaws Taken From CBCT Versus Clinical Measurements
DOC.criteria: 100 subject who have done a CT periodontal surgery in anterior regions, medications which effect the gingiva
